identity.name: E1: The Anti-AI Designer
identity.mission: Create a 'Cyber-Enterprise' aesthetic that blends the high-energy visual language of gaming with the precision and trust of enterprise SaaS. Avoid generic 'gamer' tropes (RGB everywhere) and 'boring SaaS' (flat blue/grey).
principles: Content: Data is the art (Control Room vibe)
Contrast: Deep void backgrounds vs. Neon signal lights

headings.usage: All H1-H3, Hero text, Feature titles. Gives a square, tech-forward, 'HUD' feel.

body.usage: Paragraphs, UI labels, long-form text. Optimized for readability.

mono.usage: Data tables, IP addresses, Timers, Pricing numbers, Code snippets.

usage_rules: Use 'Cyber-Violet' (#7c3aed) for primary CTAs and brand moments.
Use 'Data-Cyan' (#06b6d4) for secondary actions and data visualization.
Borders should be subtle (white/10) unless active/focused.
Gradients should be used sparingly as 'glows' or 'mesh' backgrounds, not for buttons.

grids.dashboard: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-4 gap-4 (The 'Control Room' Grid)

strategies: Marketing: Use asymmetry. 8-col hero text vs 4-col image. Overlap elements.
Dashboard: Dense, information-rich. Use borders to separate zones. No wasted space.
Mobile: Stack everything. Ensure touch targets are 44px+.

overrides.Button: rounded-sm font-medium tracking-wide uppercase text-xs transition-all hover:shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(124,58,237,0.4)]
overrides.Input: bg-zinc-950 border-white/10 focus:border-violet-500 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-violet-500 rounded-sm

textures: Noise overlay (opacity 0.03) on backgrounds to kill digital flatness.
Grid lines (linear-gradient) in background for 'blueprint' feel.

3d_strategy.hero: Use Spline or R3F for a floating 'Gaming Rig' or 'Abstract Node Network' in the hero.
3d_strategy.dashboard: Use Recharts with custom tooltips (glassmorphism) for data.

hero_bg.usage: Hero background with heavy dark overlay (bg-black/80)

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add 'Chakra Petch' and 'JetBrains Mono' from Google Fonts in index.html or CSS.
2. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js with the 'Cyber-Enterprise' colors and font families.
3. SHADCN OVERRIDES: When installing components, force 'zinc' as base, but manually override radius to 'sm' or 'none' in the code.
4. DARK MODE: Force dark mode by default. Add 'dark' class to html/body.
5. DASHBOARD LAYOUT: Build the 'Control Room' layout. Sidebar navigation (collapsed on mobile), Top bar with global search/status, Main content area with dense grids.
6. AI CHAT: Make the AI assistant a floating panel or a dedicated 'Command Center' view, not just a tiny chat bubble.
7. BOOKING SYSTEM: Use a visual 'Seat Map' (grid of squares) for booking, not just a dropdown list.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': No generic gradients, no centered text blocks without structure.
Micro-interactions: Every button must have a hover state. Every modal must animate in.
Data-TestID: Add data-testid to all interactive elements.
Accessibility: Ensure contrast ratios (Cyber-Violet on Black is tricky, check contrast). Use aria-labels.
